name: ColorPong (Crystalboi)
description:
Hello, and thank you for downloading Colorpong! 

This game is available in MacOS, Windows and Linux and was built using Unity.

The rules are simple! E to change your ball's color. If your ball is the same color as the block you are touching, you die.

TIP: Change color while on the grey area to avoid dying immediately

This project was made under 24 hours on a boring saturday (mostly for practice) but i hope some of you can enjoy this smöl minimalistic game!
